spell_list.description: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased Crit Bonus. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.
spell_list.description_pvp: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased Crit Bonus. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.

effect_list.description: On a death blow this spell will cast Coerced Intensity on target.  Lasts for 15 minutes.
Dispelled when a group member dies.
Increases Crit Bonus of group members (AE) by 1.0%
On any combat or spell hit this spell may cast Coerced Intensity on target.  Lasts for 15 minutes.  Triggers about 0.2 times per minute.
Dispelled when a group member dies.
Increases Crit Bonus of group members (AE) by 1.0%

spell_list.name: Coerced Intensity
